sentences.en: A lens would magnify the picture so it would be like looking at a large TV screen.
sentences.cn: 透镜会把图片放大，就像在看巨大的电视屏幕一样。

sentences.en: A public address system magnifies all the little noises and coughs.
sentences.cn: 扩音系统会放大任何细小的噪音和咳嗽声。

sentences.en: At the Sheffield arena, the speakers were magnified ten times on a giant screen.
sentences.cn: 在谢菲尔德体育馆，演讲者在一个巨大的屏幕上被放大了十倍。

sentences.en: He is inclined to magnify the difficulties.
He tried to magnify the part he played in the battle.
sentences.cn: 他试图夸大他在战斗中发挥的作用.

sentences.en: His eyeglasses magnify words so he can read them.
sentences.cn: 他借助眼睛把字放大以便能够阅读.

sentences.en: Light microscopes use a system of lenses to magnify an image.
sentences.cn: 光学显微镜使用透镜系统来放大图像.

sentences.en: My soul does magnify the Lord.
sentences.cn: 我的心确实是赞美上帝的.

sentences.en: My soul doth magnify the Lord.

sentences.en: Ned likes to magnify his achievements.

sentences.en: Only 30 % of people can magnify and shorten their nostril.
sentences.cn: 只有30%的人可以放大缩小自己的鼻孔.

sentences.en: Poverty and human folly magnify natural disasters.
sentences.cn: 贫困和人类的愚昧加剧了自然灾难。

sentences.en: She tends to magnify all her problems.
sentences.cn: 她往往夸大所有的问题.

sentences.en: The fact was that expropriation seemed to magnify costs and reduce productivity.
sentences.cn: 实际情况是,这些企业在收归国有以后,成本增加而生产率却下降了.

sentences.en: The report tends to magnify the risks involved
